Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 782 Filed 01/15/25 Page 109 of 158 109 LBAGmax4 Rocchio - Cross

1 BY MR. PAGLIUCA:
2 Q. I want to talk a little bit about some of the opinions that are in your letter from the government of April 23rd, 2021. So I think the first opinion that I have identified relates to individuals with particular vulnerabilities are often targeted by perpetrators of sexual abuse.
3
4 Do you recall that?
5 A. I do.
6
7 Q. So let's identify some of the categories of people that have particular vulnerabilities.
8 So that could include economically and disadvantaged people; right?
9 A. Yes.
10 Q. That would include people who don't have any family at all; correct?
11 A. It could, sure.
12 Q. It could include people who have one parent; correct?
13 A. Yes.
14 Q. It could include people who have two parents but one of them is abusive; right?
15 A. Yes.
16 Q. It could include people who have cognitive disabilities; correct?
17 A. Yes.
18 Q. It could include people who have emotional disabilities;
19
20 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
21 DOJ-OGR-00014985
